mapper.select: SELECT JOBFM, BELONG_MONTH_SECT AS belongMonthSect, START_DATE AS startDate, IBSAJA_SAL_STAN_DAY AS ibsajaSalStanDay, PEPR, PESC, PEP_RATE AS pepRate, RE_EMP_SAL_CAL AS reEmpSalCal, BONUS_TAX_CAL_STAN AS bonusTaxCalStan, FRN_TAX_FREE_RATE AS frnTaxFreeRate, PCSCS, STAN_DAY AS stanDay, STAN_HOUR AS stanHour, HOUR_OF_ONE_DAY AS hourOfOneDay, COUNT_DAY_OF_MONTH AS countDayOfMonth, JOBFM_CD AS jobfmCd FROM HS_SALARY_STANDARD
mapper.update: UPDATE HS_SALARY_STANDARD SET PESC=#{pesc}, PCSCS=#{pcscs}, FRN_TAX_FREE_RATE=#{frnTaxFreeRate}, IBSAJA_SAL_STAN_DAY=#{ibsajaSalStanDay}, RE_EMP_SAL_CAL=#{reEmpSalCal}, BELONG_MONTH_SECT=#{belongMonthSect}, STAN_HOUR=#{stanHour}, STAN_DAY=#{stanDay}, PEPR=#{pepr}, COUNT_DAY_OF_MONTH=#{countDayOfMonth}, JOBFM=#{jobfm}, START_DATE=#{startDate}, PEP_RATE=#{pepRate}, BONUS_TAX_CAL_STAN=#{bonusTaxCalStan}, HOUR_OF_ONE_DAY=#{hourOfOneDay} WHERE JOBFM_CD = #{jobfmCd}
